type: Architecture Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services
short_summary: This is a request for proposal (RFP) for the "Architecture Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services". It is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Tier 2 for services in the National Capital Region. The RFP is divided into the following sections:
description: The department is seeking two (2) proposals for the management of the internal architecture service sets, which consists of two major components: 1) Architecture Professional Services, including proof-of-concept deliverables
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: TBIPS Services**

### Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Solicitation Number:** R137874
**Publication Date:** May 12, 2023
**Closing Date:** June 22, 2023
**Selecting Authority:** Shared Services Canada (SSC)

**About the Requirement:**

Services Partagés Canada (SSC) invites eligible suppliers to submit a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under Tier 2, Architecture Services. SSC intends to award a maximum of seven (7) contracts for a period of three (3) years, with an option for a two (2) year extension.

**Key Requirements:**

* 220 days of resource utilization per annum
* Services must be delivered from SSC's National Capital Region (NCR)
* Eligible categories: I.11 Technology Architect Level 3, I.11 Technology Architect Level 2, I.10 Technical Architect Level 3, I.10 Technical Architect Level 2, P.2 Enterprise Architect Level 3, and P.2 Enterprise Architect Level 2

**Evaluation Method:**

The proposal will be evaluated based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Business Requirements:**

Eligible suppliers must have a valid Secret-level Facility Security Clearance and meet the requirements outlined in the RFP.

**Authorized Contact:**

For inquiries related to this RFP, please contact Dana Hemmings, SSC's Contracting Authority, at 343-549-4735 (phone) or dana.hemmings@ssc-spc.gc.ca (email).

### Supplier Requirements:

* Suppliers must have a valid Participating Agreement (PA) under SSC's task-based services (TBIPS) arrangement
* Suppliers must have met the requirements outlined in the RFP and be eligible to provide the required services

### Submission Requirements:

* RFP documents will be distributed electronically to eligible suppliers
* Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell service

**Note:** This RFP is subject to the exclusive right of way regarding any information disclosed during the procurement process.

### Additional Information:

This TBIPS requirement is open to eligible suppliers who meet the requirements outlined in the RFP. For more information, please refer to the TBIPS Service Arrangements page on the Government of Canada's website. Suppliers must ensure they meet the eligibility criteria before submitting a proposal. [1]
